robTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
robTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

robTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
robTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
robTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

robTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
robTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

robTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
robTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !robTheSpire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

robTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
robTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !robTheSpire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

robTheSpire:StrikeGold.NAME: Strike Gold
robTheSpire:StrikeGold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [#FFF77A]gold[] equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

robTheSpire:StealACard.NAME: Steal Card
robTheSpire:StealACard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your deck. NL Exhaust.
robTheSpire:StealACard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your deck.  NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

robTheSpire:Chris.NAME: Chris
robTheSpire:Chris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: What does this do when it is upgraded?

robTheSpire:StealASkill.NAME: Steal Skill
robTheSpire:StealASkill.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random skills to add to your deck. NL Exhaust.
robTheSpire:StealASkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random skills to add to your deck.  NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

robTheSpire:StealAnAttack.NAME: Steal Attack
robTheSpire:StealAnAttack.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random attacks to add to your deck. NL Exhaust.
robTheSpire:StealAnAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random attacks to add to your deck.  NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

robTheSpire:StealAPower.NAME: Steal Power
robTheSpire:StealAPower.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random powers to add to your deck. NL Exhaust.
robTheSpire:StealAPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random powers to add to your deck.  NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
